name: DuckTales: The Quest for Gold
description:
DuckTales: The Quest for Gold is an action-arcade game developed by Sierra On-Line and Incredible Technologies. It came out on 01-01-1990. Disney Interactive published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play DuckTales: The Quest for Gold on Atari ST, Apple II, Commodore / Amiga and PC.
David Mullich produced the game.
